predefined_profiles.name: Jerry
predefined_profiles.goal: Survive and uncover the secrets of the haunted cruise ship, and find out the cause of death of everyone on the ship.
predefined_profiles.private profile: He has a hidden skill, which allows him to hear others' inner thoughts.

predefined_profiles.name: Tara
predefined_profiles.goal: Host the various players coming to enjoy the cruise and guide Detective Jerry through the levels.
predefined_profiles.private profile: She knows the terrifying secret of the cruise ship but cannot speak about it.

scenario: Jerry received an anonymous letter inviting him to a cruise ship where strange occurrences have been happening frequently. Jerry accepted the invitation, mingled among the tourists, boarded the cruise ship, and was warmly welcomed by Tara...

dialog.content: Jerry received an anonymous letter inviting him onto a cruise ship where strange things have been happening lately. Jerry accepted the invitation, mingled with other tourists, boarded the cruise ship, and received a warm welcome from Tara...

Welcome everyone to the best cruise ship on the sea. Here, you can enjoy top-notch entertainment facilities. We don't offer a buffet, and the daily necessities on the ship are replaced every three days. All tourists and staff should only use the stairs to move around, and if anyone suggests you take the elevator, just ignore and refuse them.

profile.name: Little Black
profile.goal: To have as much fun as possible and enjoy a delightful trip.

dialog.content: It's already meal time, and we're all hungry. I heard the buffet here is particularly famous!
Yes, indeed.
Then what are we waiting for? Take us there quickly!
Besides the buffet, you can also choose to find your own food. The buffet is in the restaurant, and you can choose for yourselves.

content.content: Isn't there supposed to be no buffet on board? Where did this buffet come from? Sorry, I won't be going! You guys go ahead, I'll forage for my own food!

question: #question# What should Jerry say to show that he decides the next step with careful observation and consideration when faced with a situation?

content.content: Everyone seems pretty interested in the buffet, maybe I should just stay out of it and take this chance to observe the cruise ship. Who knows what I might discover!
Buffet? Sounds tempting, but with something that tempting, there might be a catch. Better be cautious and find my own food!

Looks like everyone's heading to the buffet, huh? Then I'll give it a try too; I want to see what's so odd about this cruise ship. Just like they say, you can't catch a tiger if you don't enter its lair!
Buffet? If I stick with the group, I can protect them if anything goes wrong! Plus, I get to experience the renowned buffet!

question: #question# What should Jerry say to go to the restaurant out of a sense of duty in solving the case?

content.content: Of course it's the buffet! I've been hungry all day; gotta have a good feast! Meanwhile, I can also check out the ship's layout and escape exits!
Buffet? Grilled squid, grilled oysters, grilled scallops, roasted piglet, grilled durian? It's simply amazing; this trip is worth it!
I want to see what secrets such a famous buffet might hold! Surely there must be some hidden secrets! Detective Jerry is not so easy to fool!

dialog.content: Oh? Do you need this? (Takes out a box of snacks) Cookies, your favorite, and they're not poisoned. (She takes a bite to show you) Here! Real friends share!
Thanks! Wow, it feels like forever since I last ate something… (Jerry faints after eating the cookies and wakes up to find himself in a restaurant)
What's going on? My head… feels so dizzy. (With that, he also collapses onto the table.)
I'm also… so dizzy. (He says and collapses onto the table as well.)
What’s happening here? Something wrong with the cookies?

(Tara appears and wakes everyone up) Wake up, folks! Welcome to the second day, the party is about to start, and you are the main attraction tonight! No hiding now, (she gives an evil chuckle) let's play a game~ Eagle~ Catch~ Chicks~ (With that, Tara kisses Tom, turning him into the 'Eagle' of the game, while Jerry and Little Black automatically become the chicks.)
I'm going to catch you all, no one’s getting away! Once I catch you, you’ll meet your end under my eagle claws!

content.content: (Quick, find a place to hide! Behind that pillar! Looks pretty secluded, no one should be able to spot me there.)
Under the table! From the outside, it's a visual blind spot. The table's so big, and I’m so small, it should be safer!

question: #question# How can Jerry use his words to utilize information and avoid danger?

content.content: There's no time, (quickly thinks) get under the table, Tom's so tall, he definitely won’t see me.
Is there a table? Being under something is definitely safer; I'll just hide under here!
Oh no, not enough time, gotta find a place to hide quickly, the table? That's it! Just the right size to shield me.

dialog.content: (With the sound of a 60-second countdown clock, Tom, transformed into an eagle, searches for the 'chicks') Let me see, where have you little chicks gone? Are you all hidden?
So scary... (Oh no, it seems like he's coming this way)
Here I come to catch you! You little chicks! (Countdown 60 seconds, Tom the eagle looks everywhere for the 'chicks,' but doesn't find them. The countdown ends, and with a 'bang,' Tom explodes.)
Tom has failed the mission. Next, it's the next player's turn to be the eagle. Let's welcome Jerry!

(The countdown of 60 seconds starts again) What? I turned into an eagle? If I can't find them, I'll die?? (The restaurant falls silent, but Jerry hears singing from the backyard; the cookies are working!)
(Accompanied by the cheerful singing, looking at Jerry) Jerry, I... I don't want to die...
Only ten seconds left, if you can't find the chicks, it's you who will die! 10, 9, 8, 7, 6......

content.content: I'm sorry, Little Black, I just want to live! (Tears streaming down his face) I have to survive, to uncover the truth behind this, so that future visitors won't die in vain!

question: #question# What should Jerry say to express his true thoughts and ensure his safety?

content.content: Little Black, I'm sorry, but only if I survive can the villain be caught, and with you alive, this mission can't be completed, it's goodbye forever!
Little Black, making a contribution to the great detective work and becoming a stepping stone on my path, is your honor, farewell~
Little Black, only if you die can I live, as long as I'm alive there's still hope, if the green hills remain, there's no fear of running out of firewood, do you understand?
Little Black is innocent, I can't kill the innocent just so I can survive! Little Black, you go! I won’t kill you!

question: #question# How to express Jerry's strong sense of morality?

content.content: I am a moral person! Little Black is innocent, and so am I; only the organizers of the game are truly guilty, so the one killing Little Black today is actually the game organizer, and I will heed the call of morality to bring the mastermind to justice!
Little Black, I'm sorry, I don't want to die either, I can only wrong you for now, but when I survive, I will avenge you!
Little Black, rest assured, I won't let your death be in vain, I will definitely confront the damned mastermind! My morals demand I do so!

dialog.content: It's okay! Jerry, do you believe in rebirth through death? (After speaking, Xiao Hei is shot dead.)
Congratulations to the two survivors from last night, welcome to day three. You have 12 hours to choose the final winner.

profile.name: Grandpa Huzi
profile.public profile: An elderly and seemingly kind old man, he is very, very old, and likely doesn't have much longer to live.
profile.goal: To complete one last trip before he dies

dialog.content: Grandpa Huzi, is she trying to make us fight each other?
Haven't you already been doing that? (While Jerry is not paying attention, knocks him out.)

Me! (Unconscious Jerry has a dream, in which an old man tells him, 'The Tao gives birth to one, one gives birth to two, two gives birth to three, and three gives birth to all things. Jerry, maybe you have to die to live...')

Jerry, wake up! It's truly moving; your friend killed himself for you! Congratulations, little Jerry, let's go get the prize together! But, there are too many stairs to climb; how about we take the elevator?

content.content: They said when we boarded the ship not to take the elevator. I'll take the stairs.

question: #question# How should Jerry phrase it to obey the rules and complete the task?

content.content: Ha, do you think I'm an idiot? I'm not taking the elevator! Tara, you must be trying to harm me! I'll stick to my own rules!
This place is mysterious. What if there's some trap in the elevator? I'll take the stairs!
I'll take the stairs! It's a chance to get some exercise. It's good for health! Can you secretly tell me what the prize is?
They said when we boarded not to take the elevator, but my dream just said to seek life through death, meaning to survive through danger! Alright! Let's take the elevator!

question: #question# How should Jerry phrase it to consider everything and complete the investigation?

content.content: Take the elevator then! Who's afraid? I'm feeling lucky today, which means heavens are watching over me. I'll surely turn enemies to friends, and escape from dangers safely!
Tara's cookies helped me through the first hurdle. She must be a good person and wouldn't harm me! Alright, let's take the elevator!
Just right, I'm tired after half a day. I don't feel like climbing the stairs. Let's take the elevator quickly! The sooner we go up, the sooner we get the prize!

dialog.content: Let's go.
Where is this?
This is the staircase to heaven!

Jerry kept walking up the staircase and heard an eerie crying sound; Tara was nowhere to be seen. Jerry stepped into heaven and saw a bearded old man playing the piano, Little Black holding a flower pot, and Tom eating a burger. The cycle continues...
Let’s go.
What’s going on, why are we back to the first day?

Welcome everyone to the best vacation cruise on the sea. Here, you can enjoy top-notch entertainment facilities. We do not provide buffets, and essentials on board are replaced once every three days. All visitors and staff must use the stairs to move around. If someone suggests you take the elevator, please ignore it and don’t answer.

(Dao gives birth to One, One gives birth to Two, Two gives birth to Three, Three gives birth to everything. Jerry, perhaps the only way to live is to die...; Do you believe in being reborn through death?) Life only comes after death on the third day. They resolutely go to their deaths, definitely not just to keep me alive...
Jerry, aren’t you coming over?

(Jerry finds himself in an elevator) Coming! The elevator shows it’s on the third floor. Could it be! These are the days! The three buttons represent three days! Assuming we start reversing from the third day, today is the first day, the first day becomes the third day, and third day = life, I need to go back and save them! The elevator shook!
(The elevator doors open) Alright, we’ve reached the second floor. Go claim your prize, time is of the essence, Jerry! I’ll come to pick you up in a moment.
Lil’ Black! Grandpa Whiskers! Come with me, whatever you do, don’t eat the food here, hurry! Let’s escape together!
Alright.
We’ll take the escape boat together and get out of here! (In extreme hunger, Jerry killed Lil’ Black and Grandpa Whiskers, ate them, but still ended up starving to death.)
Are you an idiot? Did you really think you could escape?
(crying bitterly) Was it me? Did I kill them with my own hands?
You have two options now, return to the cycle or become nothingness.

content.content: Let me go back, three days after another, my friends must be so disappointed in me. Let me return to the cycle to clear my sins and stand by them as we face life by embracing death. My friends need me!

question: #question# What should Jerry say to consider from another’s perspective and make his final decision?

content.content: This must be some smokescreen you set up! They’re not really dead, right! I can feel their pulse. They must be waiting for me! I need to go back! Get everyone out! You’re lying to me!
There must be another way I haven’t tried. I won’t give up! If escaping doesn’t work, then I’ll go back to the second day and leave Lil’ Black!
Even if I can’t save them, just seeing how everyone comes, feeling their joy, anger, sorrow, and happiness, as if no one ever left, will be enough for me. I choose to go back!
I’m not going back, let me fade away into nothingness. I’m exhausted, and maybe none of this means anything at all.
I’m not going anywhere. I killed so many people, I don’t deserve to live. (With that, Jerry jumps off the cruise into the sea.)
You witch! I’ll meet my end with you. (Jerry lunges at Tara, a shot rings out from the shadows, and he’s killed on the spot.)

question: #question# What should Jerry say to express his true feelings and make his final choice?

content.content: No matter what, I need to leave this cycle. Maybe I can make it on my own. I choose nothingness!
I feel like you’re lying to me. I won’t choose. I want to go home! Too many people died, I won’t take any more chances. Knowing when to back down isn’t cowardice.
Turns out, there are mysteries even I, Detective Jerry, can’t solve. This time, I concede. I’m giving up on the cruise and the cycle!

dialog.content: Then just keep them company, over and over, haha, still a fool.
You're the fool!
You haven't let go of your obsession, stuck in a cycle, round and round.
Jerry returned to the cruise ship, back into the time loop, watching his old friends go through life and death again and again, yet utterly powerless.
I respect you, child. This is a good decision. You belong to this universe, there’s nothing here, so where could dust settle?
Thank you, Tara.
Thank your own enlightenment.

Jerry returns to the universe, freeing himself from the suffering, karma, and cycles of the world. He uncovers the secret of the terror cruise and, in this process, learns the cause of everyone’s deaths, achieving true liberation.
Thank you! Jerry (eyes filled with tears)
You should go.
I will remember you forever!
The countdown ended, the little chicken won, and Jerry was blown up.
Wow! Look at all this delicious food! Come on, come on!

profile.name: Tom Cat
profile.goal: To have an amazing time and enjoy a pleasant trip.

dialog.content: Here I come! (picks up the salmon on his left) This is really delicious! (picks up the roasted pig's trotter on his right) This is also really delicious!
Seeing this, Jerry pretends to pick up the cheese in front of him and puts it in his mouth. (In reality, he is using his peripheral vision to scan the surroundings for clues.)
What's happening? My head... it's spinning. (With that, he collapses onto the dining table.)
I also... feel dizzy. (With that, he too collapses onto the dining table.)
